TITLE: :wrench: DM Join system :
DESCRIPTION: If it doesn't work, check the bot permissions or join our [support server]({{discord}})
ENABLED_YES_CONTENT: {{success}} Join messages in dm enabled. Disable them with `{{prefix}}setdmjoin`.
ENABLED_NO_CONTENT: {{error}} Join messages in dm disabled. Enable them with `{{prefix}}setdmjoin`.
MESSAGE_CONTENT: No message defined. Set it with `{{prefix}}configdm`!
